name: Ray of Necromancy

m.text: diamonds worth 300 gp, which the spell consumes

entries: Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the creature takes 2d4 necrotic damage.
At the end of each of the targetâ€™s turns, it can make a Constitution saving throw against the spell. On a success, the spell ends for the target.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you may produce one additional ray for every level above 2nd level.
